name: Pluto's Revolution
description:
Pluto's Revolution is a fun side-scroller where you play as Pluto's 5 moons and try to get them back into orbit. Avoid obstacles and find the optimal path to reach safety.

Game includes a Story mode with 5 short high intensity levels, and an Arcade mode, where you can keep playing infinitely to reach a high score.

WASD or Arrow Keys for Movement, have fun!
